attributes.action: define how much growth is sustainable and say when growth will lower the quality of life of the citizens of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious that growth cannot be sustained indefinitely. We live in a finite environment with limited resources. At some point we need to stop growing and it would be best if that was done in a planned and controlled way.  I believe that we have already passed the point where economic growth is reducing our quality of life (NOT our "standard of living" which is a purely economic measure) and that government is failing us by not seeing that. The cost of this can be seen in our schools, hospitals and night-time streets.
